title: When will BTS have their next comeback as of July 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: A few days ago, they released a (primarily) Japanese album, called Map of the Soul: 7 The Journey. All of the songs were Japanese versions of some of their new songs, as well as some of their older popular songs. The only ones that were Korean were (the intro/outro ofc), Lights, Your Eyes Tell, and Stay Gold. There have been rumors that BTS is having a comeback sometime in fall, like October or November. I’m not sure if Bighit has actually said anything, or maybe the members accidentally have. *cough*Namjoon*cough*Edit: They’re releasing a new album, “BE (Deluxe Edition)” in November! But anyways, nothing’s for sure yet. (Ok it may be, but the fans don’t know yet.) And I still wanna see a filter dance ahhh!!!! Please!!! :/ Hope this helps! -Rey
They’re releasing a new single in August. Their actual album is still in the making and I believe it’ll be released sometime this year.
